tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE player_statistics (
    player_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    player_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    games_played INT NOT NULL,
    total_score INT NOT NULL,
    achievements JSONB
);

CREATE TABLE achievements (
    achievement_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    player_id INT,
    achievement_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    achievement_points INT NOT NULL,
    FOREIGN KEY (player_id) REFERENCES players(player_id)
);
CREATE TABLE players ( player_id INT PRIMARY KEY, player_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, player_rating FLOAT NOT NULL );
CREATE TABLE achievements ( achievement_id INT PRIMARY KEY, achievement_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, achievement_points INT NOT NULL );
CREATE TABLE player_stats ( player_id INT, games_played INT NOT NULL, total_score INT NOT NULL, FOREIGN KEY (player_id) REFERENCES players(player_id) );

CREATE TABLE player_achievements (
	player_id INT NOT NULL,
	achievement_id INT NOT NULL,
	achievement_date DATE NOT NULL,
	PRIMARY KEY (player_id, achievement_id),
	FOREIGN KEY (player_id) REFERENCES players (player_id),
	FOREIGN KEY (achievement_id) REFERENCES achievements (achievement_id)
);

CREATE TABLE player_achievements (
    player_id INT,
    achieve_id INT,
    completed_date DATE,
    FOREIGN KEY (player_id) REFERENCES players(player_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (achieve_id) REFERENCES achievements(achieve_id)
);

CREATE TABLE player_history (
    history_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    player_id INT,
    event_date DATE,
    event_description TEXT,
    FOREIGN KEY (player_id) REFERENCES players(player_id)
);
